name: Yoga
description: Yoga improves your posture, which helps in preventing neck and lower back pain. It increases flexibility, can you touch your toes? It builds strength to prevent straining your muscles and increases blood flow to all parts of your body. You may even get a better night's sleep with the reduce stress on your body!

name: Body Sculpting
description: All in one fitness to sweat, sculpt and strengthen. All ages and fitness levels welcome. Group training available! Sandy does small group sessions, get your friends together and come work out with Sandy! Sandy also specializes in senior fitness. Ask for group pricing!
